name: PathPartner Technology Consulting Pvt.Ltd
description:
PathPartner based out of California, USA and Bangalore, India is a leading provider of Consulting, Services and Solutions for digital media centric devices market. 
PathPartner has developed several applications for Android, iOS and Windows platforms targeting different segment of consumers. Our mobile apps development service offerings include application development & testing, User Interface design & customization, Cloud Integration, Web Technology, Analytics and more.
 Our Mobile Apps team can assist in building memory and power optimized mobile apps involving Multimedia Experience, Imaging & Analytics, Digital Rights Management, Sensor, Location, Notifications and Data Synchronisation using native or hybrid development model.
READ MORE...
